text: Lumbrein was a municipality of the district Surselva in the canton of Lucerne in Switzerland. The municipalities of Cumbel, Degen, Lumbrein, Morissen, Suraua, Vignogn, Vella, and Vrin merged on 1 January 2013, into the new municipality of Lumnezia. ==Other websites== * Official Website Category:Former municipalities of Graub√ºnden
title: Lumbrein
